summary: Allow you to craft Ancient nord arrow,Nord Hero Arrow and ancient Nord amulet
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod will allow you to craft Ancient Nord arrow,Nord Hero Arrow and ancient Nord amulet.Ancient Nord Amulet can be enchant,Nord hero bow now can be improve
Require
Ancient Nord Arrow(24)
1 Steel Ingot.1 firewood(Skyforge smithing unclock)
Ancien Nord Hero Arrow(24)
24 Ancient Nord Arrow ,1 steel ingot,1 Corundum Ingot(Skyforge smithing unclock)
Ancient Nord Amulet
1 gold ingot,1 bear claws ,1 leather,1 leather strips(Skyforge smithing unclock)

I made this mod because after many hour find on internet,i can\'t find this simple mod.If this mod help you guy , i very happy
author: NTN7991
